annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's the end of the match.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Giovani Lo Celso produces a sweet pass and picks out Julian Draxler (Paris SG) inside the box. He quickly takes a shot which goes into the bottom right corner and leaves the goalkeeper helpless. He makes it 0:5!

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Amaury Delerue shows a yellow card to Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG) for his blatant foul.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Christophe Galtier has decided to substitute Kevin Malcuit and he is replaced by Ronael Pierre Gabriel (St Etienne).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: A substitution has been made. Marco Verratti is replaced by Giovani Lo Celso (Paris SG).

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The manager has decided to make a substitution and Lucas walks off the pitch to be replaced by Goncalo Guedes (Paris SG).

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Lucas (Paris SG) has a great chance inside the box and puts the ball into the back of the net.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Lucas (Paris SG) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner kick from Lucas (Paris SG) is headed out of the penalty area by one of the defenders.
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) came close to scoring. He connected with a pass inside the box and perhaps should have done better than direct his shot straight at Stephane Ruffier.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) is quickest to react to the rebound and stabs the ball into the back of the net. It's 0:3.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Robert Beric is replaced by Alexander Soderlund (St Etienne).
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) misses a promising opportunity! He rises for a cross and unleashes a poor header from near the penalty spot. The ball floats high over the crossbar!
Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) smashes the ball towards goal from the edge of the penalty box, but his effort flies just a few inches wide of the right post.
Julian Draxler (Paris SG) misses a sitter as his shot goes over the bar.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Henri Saivet makes his way off the pitch and Benjamin Corgnet (St Etienne) comes on as his replacement.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Romain Hamouma (St Etienne) takes the corner, but he overhits it and none of his teammates are able to reach the ball.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Romain Hamouma (St Etienne) is cleared by the defence.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Jordan Veretout (St Etienne) takes the corner but it's cleared.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Lucas (Paris SG) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Lucas (Paris SG) takes the corner which is cleared.

Julian Draxler (Paris SG) must feel embarrassed now. He received a killer pass, but his shot from the six yard box was a disaster. He miskicked and made it very easy for Stephane Ruffier to get hold of the ball. Paris SG get a corner.
Amaury Delerue blows his whistle for a foul after Florentin Pogba (St Etienne) hacks down one of his opponents.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: The teams are back out for the second half and here is a change on the pitch. Unai Emery Etxegoien gives a chance to Marquinhos (Paris SG) and Thiago Silva is off.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The players are back out on the pitch following the half time break and the second half is about to start.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has reached half time.
Marco Verratti (Paris SG) came close to scoring but should have done much better. His poor attempt from close range ended up in the gloves of Stephane Ruffier.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Goal! Lucas (Paris SG) pounced on a loose ball inside the box and beats the goalkeeper with a shot into the top of the net. He makes it 0:2.
Marco Verratti (Paris SG) pulls the shirt of his opponent and the referee stops play for a foul.

Paris SG slow the tempo of the game down by exchanging a combination of one or two touch passes. The opposition's players are finding it very difficult at the moment, very physically demanding to run without the ball.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Henri Saivet (St Etienne) was quite harsh and Amaury Delerue didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
Romain Hamouma (St Etienne) fouls an opponent. At least that's what referee Amaury Delerue signals.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Lucas (Paris SG) decides to speed play up with a short corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Julian Draxler (Paris SG) is cleared by the opposition's defence.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Kevin Malcuit (St Etienne) takes the corner kick, but Kevin Trapp reads it well and stops the effort.
Amaury Delerue blows his whistle. Jordan Veretout (St Etienne) commits a foul after dangerous play.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Lucas (Paris SG) is cleared away by the defence.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: St Etienne didn't take advantage of the corner and score as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Lucas (Paris SG) takes the resulting corner which is well defended.
Blaise Matuidi (Paris SG) has a great chance to score from deep inside the box! He finds some space for the shot, but sends it errantly way past the left post. Very poor attempt.
Lucas (Paris SG) has a good chance to get on the scoresheet and fires the ball towards goal from the edge of the penalty box, but it goes narrowly over the crossbar.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Edinson Cavani (Paris SG) finds some space inside the box and powers his header past the goalkeeper, giving him no chance.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The first half has just begun.
Today's referee will be Amaury Delerue.

annotations.label: lineup1
annotations.description: We now know the starting lineups. You can find them in the match details of this match.
Welcome to our minute by minute commentary of today's clash. You can enjoy a written form of everything important that will be happening on the pitch. Have fun.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's the end of the match.
